body.p: Your petitioners would respectfuly represent to your excelency that at the Barren Equity and Criminal court that our gilmore P Hay was Convicted of felony for man slaughter for the Killing of thos Barret in an affray and sentanced To serve in the penetintiary of Kentucky two years G P Hay was very young not twenty one When it happened and at a time when the Deceased had a drawn gunn in his hand we Believe that under these circumstances that G P Hay the unfortunate youth ought to Be pardoned we would further represent to your Excelency that G P Hay is the only child of an Afflicted father Peter a Hay who is poor very Poor and has Been confined to his Bed nearly NAll his time for five or six years and such is his distrest and afflicted condition that he Needs the serveses and comforts and security of His only child we therefore most earnestly Entreat your excelency to enterpose the power of or pardoning power and restore said Boy to the Bosom and security of his afflicted father
